page.title: 13NANTGLYN SHOW.
page.content: The main event of the year is the Agricultural Show.It is organised by the Young Farmers and is always held on the last Thursday of August.This is a large effort for a small village and about 2000 visitors attend,it is a great time for family re-unions. All entries must be from within 6 miles of Nantglyn. There is a large entry for sheep with 11 sectionsfor Hardy Welsh, 7 for Suffolks and many for other breeds.Cattle and pony sections are very popular. Women's interests are encouraged by Merched y Wawr, which ensures a high standard of entry. Early evening is the time for sport ranging from the flat race for under 6's to the 1 mile open. A recent addition is the best trick on a BMX bike.The evening ends with a disco in the chuch house.
